quoteText:
In accordance with European Union privacy law, if you are in the EEA you have the following rights in respect of your personal information that we hold:

(a) Right of access.
title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states that if you are in the EEA, you have (a) Right of access: "You have the right to obtain . . . a copy of the personal information we hold about you"; and (d) Right to erasure: "You have the right, in some circumstances, to require us to erase your personal information without undue delay if the continued processing of that personal information is not justified." It also states that "residents in other jurisdictions may also have similar rights to the above" and that you can contact them to exercise those rights.
